Reviews.Title: worth it,good quality
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: this inercom phone that is as good as the Galaxy Note 3 but only pay about $270 without a contract.That means you can save $500 for a smartphone.waht's for?The android os runs no diffrence from samsung and other android phones,but price much lower!Especially,this phone is quadcore and has 8G internal memory.The screen of the phone has a great resolution---5.7 inch display with super HD (1280*720 pixels) resolution,even bigger than note 3.The video player is great, I can set up 16:9/4:3 full screen by myself.It have 850Mhz and 2100Mhz for 3G---quick.It can work with AT&T;,Tmobile very well.The wireless and Bluetooth work well, call quality is clear too.The signal is full everytime.For the GPS function,I download the maps and use it as a GPS for my car.Over all,inecom is good phone,good price.I will introduce my friends to buy inercom phones on amazon!

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone
Reviews.Author: Sara C.
Reviews.Content: This phone is MTK latest quadcore CPU smarphone.It is 1.2GHz .So,the phone runs all apps very fast,even the big games.The ROM is 8GB,but the OS and other apps have taken about 2.5.There is only about 5.7G left for me to use.That is enough for me.For big movies and TV,I can expend to 32GB by the memory card.The 5.7 inch display with super HD (1280*720 pixels)is wonderful.I use it like a small tablet pc.That is why I recomment this phone!It shows the pics,letters and movies very very clear.There are 2 cameras.8M for the back with flash,2MP for the front.Good enough but not excllent.However,at this price level,I can not requir more.By the way,the free leather case is really what I want!

Reviews.Title: best android quad core phone
Reviews.Author: noreen
Reviews.Content: There are 2 big 3200mah batteries.One battery can work for 4 days.Amazing!The free case like samsung works very good.Maybe,it will be better if can work like smart case.hehe:) Just advice.This phone is unlocked.NO contract, NO catch.It works with my straight talk sim and AT&T; SIM card very well.The phone is 5.7 720p HD screen,even bigger than the Galaxy Note.So,it is like a samll tablet .but not to big,I can put it in my pocket and bing it to anywhere.The 5.7 screen is very clear and shocked me when I play gamesoft games.I can download all the apps from google play.Also the Camera, it has good resolution---12MP, has wonderful color.The flash on it is good too. Great choice!Positives-Great Value-1G RAM-Nice Screen,720P-12 mp cam-Front cam-Solid feel (friends keep thinking its a Samsung)-Android 4.2 OS-Dual SIM-Quadband,3G-Free case-2 big batteries

Reviews.Title: A very good buy, excellent quality. Reliable seller and much sooner than scheduled delivery.
Reviews.Author: LS
Reviews.Content: I bought this smartphone to replace my other 4" smartphone OPPOX903, which is better than iPhones that my wife, son, and daughter all use. I use it also to replace my ASUS laptop and cell phone. This N7300 is big enough for my older than 70 years eyes.  My vision is not as good as before, especially I had many eye surgeries. I also have an iPAD but it is awkward to carry around when you are out for a trip. 5.7" is very nice to watch TV as well as other online stuff.The dual SIM card slot is very convenient for me to use it also in another country. And of course it is unlocked. Sorry, all those companies that sell you a smartphone packaged and charge you an arm and a leg, and pretending of generous deal. 5.7" screen is very nice, I wish to have a 6" one, but it cost twice as much.I had it for a week now. So far so good. I have recommended it to my friends.The camera is not so good. It is way out of focus. But I use a Nikon D800E camera. Nothing beats it for quality and capability. I bought the camera and this "inercom(TM) Unlocked N7300 - 5.7 Inch huge HD Screen (1280*720 pixels)" both from Amazon.com as I always do.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Jose Pereda Diaz
Reviews.Content: The ulefone n9002 is excelent is 100% equal to samsung note 3, i purchase original acesories from samsung and fit on the ulefone its great.The cons was the batery is 2600 mah, so i upgrade to 4200 mah bat, whit this batery i use all day whout recharge the phone.

Reviews.Title: Cool Product
Reviews.Author: Loyd R. Hamilton
Reviews.Content: This phone / tablet is more than expected.  I was a little skeptical about purchasing a phone from anyone other than a dealer or electronics store.  The phone is very user friendly - not that complicated to set up and had it going in about 30 minutes with all my contacts and stored media from my old iPhone.  Takes a little getting use to.  Like a lot of the features - miss a few from the iPhone but overall very happy.  The screen makes it easy to read email or search the web.  Seller was able to get it to my door in about 15 days - even with Christmas shipment.  Batter last pretty well - depends on how much data you try to push or download.  have had absolutely no problems with the product.  Suggest you give one a try.

Reviews.Title: excelent quadcore
Reviews.Author: bal
Reviews.Content: Im impress this phone quadcore  so fast work in at&t; network h+..but tmobile only edge..large screen hd and video call very good. Recommended

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Robert B
Reviews.Content: Delivery: I received this phone in about a week, so the delivery service was good.Support: They responded to all my emails quicklyProduct: The phone has a large screen , high resolution, very beautiful with responsive hardware in general! My device came with a MKT6589 quad core. I verified it while using hardware scanning apps from Google Play Store.Network: I had to purchase an ATT SIM card at Walmart in order to get the 3G performance, otherwise  T-Mobile was 2G. So far, my fast 4G HTC behaves slow at 2G speed on the T-Mobile Network as well..(?)Battery: I was expecting 3200 mAh, but my toy came with two satisfactory 2600 mAh,General: This is a very affordable smartphone with latest features.

Reviews.Title: wonderful phone
Reviews.Author: Kayla
Reviews.Content: The N7300 screen resolution is 1280 * 720, such a high resolution on the 5.7-inch screen is very clear.the color of the screen is really bright. Android 4.2 runs quite smoothly.There are 2 pcs 3200mah batteries.The 8G ROM is very big to download movile, pictures and games.The games work well and easy.The camera is 1200MP.I think this phone is as good as samsung android phones.But the price is only 1/3.Maybe, innercom is the new brand.They want to export the market.But as to me, it worth the price --- quad core, 8GB ROM, 12MP camera.What 's for!Great deal!I will recomend this phone.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy, until a Week....
Reviews.Author: Jamal Alle
Reviews.Content: GOOD  HONEST  REVEIW  PLEASE  READ!!!!!!!!!Excuse My mechanics, grammar, punctuation, spelling etc.Bought straight from UlephoneTook about a week to get to my houseWhen i bought the product the product was flawless..... it suited all my needs.In about a week some problems came up.1. Camera glitch- This is not a permanent glitch it comes on and off but  is really annoying if you have to take a picture at a certain time- You open the camera app and there are horizontal bars blocking the picture showing through the camera when you take the picture the picture comes out with those same bars.- Usually a restart of the phone would solve the problem......2. Mic Stops Working- after a week the mic suddenly stops working..- No damage to the phone, not even a drop or a tumble, mic stops working...- Really bad thing if your planning to use this device as a phone- Although their is another way... if you are a frequent music listener... your headphones would do the trick... if your headphones have a mic.- i have tried everything, repair, old methods.. nothing would work..- ill update if i fix the problem...3. Fake S-Pen-Now this was kind of a disappointment all the S-Pen is is a plastic stylus and a magnet on the inside to trigger air command.- the fake button on the pen does not work ( it is a design)- Real S-Pen doesn't work either on it....- Scratches Screen protector pretty badly After a weeks use..... since its a hard plastic stick.....  ( in my case i used it only twice in the week)In conclusion.... i suggest you save the money up for an actual Note 3 instead of Buying this.... (which i am planning to do, refurbished, last price i saw $220)But if you want to stay on the cheap side like i wanted to... go ahead.....i suffered the consequences..

Reviews.Title: N9002
Reviews.Author: A Welschmeyer
Reviews.Content: I just recieved my phone today Came with phone a back and a s view case earphones screen protector already on it one battery and i believe that is it. I let it charge to 100% before turning on. turned on and got it set up. Its looking like a good phone. I like everything so far Camera isn't the best but may need to check setting. It shows there is a pen like the note 3 in the pictures but  mine did not come with a pen or even a slot for one which is disappointing. The note 3 case i tried fit but didn't have a hole on the back for the speaker. battery don't look like it will last very long may need a different one it came with 3200.Will try and update after getting some use out of it.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone!
Reviews.Author: jasmine turner
Reviews.Content: I just received my phone the other day and so far so good. Took me a minute to get the internet working but once i got  that figured out it was pretty good. My friends love it and it came with so much stuff. I love my smartcase and how it came with a screen protector on it and an extra one along with headphones and extra battery! Great buy would defintily recommend!

Reviews.Title: Great Phone and Value
Reviews.Author: Lloyd R Bennett
Reviews.Content: Seller answered questions very quickly and responded to a return request post haste. Unit malfunctioned, will not charge after few days of use. Understand this can happen to any product, intend to reorder.

Reviews.Title: LOVE OF MY LIFE!!!
Reviews.Author: Tysheena
Reviews.Content: This phone is the best! Came very fast, works well and came with two batteries!! GET THIS PHONE!! I just slide in my sim-card and it worked with no problems

Reviews.Title: Not as expected
Reviews.Author: Lupe
Reviews.Content: The Item did not function well, had many faults, would not charge and the screen changed screens by itself did not meet expectations.

Reviews.Title: 3g connection is impossible.
Reviews.Author: Desiree
Reviews.Content: Very nice phone all fine with wi fi but 3g connection is impossible. Without that the phone does not work, I want to solve the problem or my money back

Reviews.Title: not good
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I should rate this at a 0. They sent me the wrong phone. It is bigger than the note 3 and doesn't fit in any cases. Don't buy this.

ProductInfo.Features:
Unlocked world GSM phone. 3G - 850/2100, 2G -850/900/1800/1900. Compatible with at&t;, T-Mobile, Straight Talk, Simple Mobile and other GSM networks. Please make sure your SIM card is not locked with PUK code
3G - 850/2100 bands. Fully compatible with at&t;, stright Talk & Net10 at 2G/3G. compatilble with T-Mobile & Simple Mobile at 2G. For Straight Talk, Trac fone, Simple Mobile or Net 10 will requires a manual APN setup
Free Tether - Use your 3G data service as a WiFi hot spot and connect your notebook, ipad or other device for free. No need to pay monthly tether fee
CPU MTK6582, Cortex A7 quad core, 1.3GHz; GPU: PowerVR SGX 544
Sim Card:	one Micro SIM Card and one standard SIM card.Dual Standby
ProductInfo.Name: Ulefone N9002 Smartphone Android 4.2 Mtk6582 Quad Core 1gb 8gb 5.7 Inch Hd Screen OTG Gesture Sensing 3g Dual Sim -White
